emi_breakdown.description: An EMI consists of principal and interest components.
emi_breakdown.details: In the early stage of the loan, a larger portion goes toward interest. Over time, the principal component increases.

interest_calculation.explanation: Interest is calculated on the outstanding principal after each EMI payment.

foreclosure.personal_loan: Foreclosure charges may apply depending on loan agreement terms.
foreclosure.home_loan_floating: Floating rate home loans for individuals may not attract foreclosure charges as per regulatory norms.
foreclosure.business_loan: Business loan foreclosure charges depend on contractual agreement.

prepayment_penalty.personal_loan: Prepayment penalties may apply if part of the loan is repaid before schedule.
prepayment_penalty.home_loan_fixed: Fixed rate home loans may attract prepayment charges.

processing_time.personal_loan: Typically 2–5 working days subject to verification.
processing_time.home_loan: Generally 7–15 working days including property valuation.

credit_cards.late_payment_fee: Late fees may apply if payment is not received by the due date.
credit_cards.minimum_due: Paying only the minimum due avoids late fees but interest continues on remaining balance.
credit_cards.interest_calculation: Interest is charged on the outstanding balance if full payment is not made by due date.
credit_cards.cash_advance: Cash advances attract finance charges from the withdrawal date.

accounts.minimum_balance: Certain accounts require maintaining a minimum balance as per bank policy.
accounts.overdraft: Overdraft allows withdrawal beyond available balance up to approved limit.
accounts.account_freeze: Accounts may be frozen due to compliance checks or suspicious activity.

insurance.term_insurance: Provides life coverage for a fixed term at relatively lower premiums.
insurance.health_waiting_period: Certain claims may not be admissible during the waiting period.
insurance.claim_process: Claims require documentation and are processed as per insurer guidelines.

security.otp: OTP should never be shared with anyone.
security.phishing: Do not click suspicious links or share confidential information.
security.card_loss: Block lost or stolen cards immediately through official channels.
